#summary How to provide a .csv file as grid source

<wiki:toc max_depth="3" />

= Introduction =
You can easily display your csv file within a grid by just specifying a few thing.

=How?=

{{{
$grid->setSource(new Bvb_Grid_Source_Csv($file,$fields,$separator));
}}}

Where 

{{{
$file //Is the source file
$fields // is NULL or and array specifying the fields. If NULL the first row will be used as fields
$separator //The value separator. Default is _,_ 
}}}

||You can now use your grid with all options as you expected, except CRUD operations.||
